head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BENNETT, ARMAND S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BENNETT, ARMAND S.

block.p: BENNETT-Armand S. On May 6, 2000. Beloved husband of the late Eleanor. Loving father of Fredric and Barbara. Father-in-law of Sheree. Cherished grandfather of Jeffrey, Elliott and Rachel. Dearest brother of Toby Benson. In lieu of flowers donations to the American Heart Association. Services 12 Noon Tuesday from Schwartz Brothers-Jeffer Memorial Chapels, 114-03 Queens Blvd (76th Road), Forest Hills, NY. For information call 718-263-7600
